enhanced_by.reason: The validate method relies on the instance created by getInstance to determine the country code check behavior.
The validate method performs a similar validation check as isValid, making it useful to invoke isValid before validate to ensure the code is valid.
The validate method uses checkCode to verify the country code if checkCountryCode is true, making it useful to assert the result of checkCode after validate.
The validate method delegates part of its validation to VALIDATOR.validate, making it useful to assert the result of VALIDATOR.validate after validate.
